58 namespace robot_interaction
59 {
60 static const float END_EFFECTOR_UNREACHABLE_COLOR[4] = { 1.0, 0.3, 0.3, 1.0 };
61 static const float END_EFFECTOR_REACHABLE_COLOR[4] = { 0.2, 1.0, 0.2, 1.0 };
62 
63 const std::string RobotInteraction::INTERACTIVE_MARKER_TOPIC = "robot_interaction_interactive_marker_topic";
64 
65 RobotInteraction::RobotInteraction(const moveit::core::RobotModelConstPtr& robot_model, const std::string& ns)
66  : robot_model_(robot_model), kinematic_options_map_(new KinematicOptionsMap)
67 {
68  topic_ = ns.empty() ? INTERACTIVE_MARKER_TOPIC : ns + "/" + INTERACTIVE_MARKER_TOPIC;
69  int_marker_server_ = new interactive_markers::InteractiveMarkerServer(topic_);
70 
71  // spin a thread that will process feedback events
72  run_processing_thread_ = true;
73  processing_thread_ = std::make_unique<boost::thread>(boost::bind(&RobotInteraction::processingThread, this));
74 }
75 
76 RobotInteraction::~RobotInteraction()
77 {
78  run_processing_thread_ = false;
79  new_feedback_condition_.notify_all();
80  processing_thread_->join();
81 
82  clear();
83  delete int_marker_server_;
84 }
85 
86 void RobotInteraction::decideActiveComponents(const std::string& group)
87 {
88  decideActiveComponents(group, InteractionStyle::SIX_DOF);
89 }
90 
91 void RobotInteraction::decideActiveComponents(const std::string& group, InteractionStyle::InteractionStyle style)
92 {
93  decideActiveEndEffectors(group, style);
94  decideActiveJoints(group);
95  if (!group.empty() && active_eef_.empty() && active_vj_.empty() && active_generic_.empty())
96  ROS_INFO_NAMED("robot_interaction",
97  "No active joints or end effectors found for group '%s'. "
98  "Make sure that kinematics.yaml is loaded in this node's namespace.",
99  group.c_str());
100 }
101 
102 void RobotInteraction::addActiveComponent(const InteractiveMarkerConstructorFn& construct,
103  const ProcessFeedbackFn& process, const InteractiveMarkerUpdateFn& update,
104  const std::string& name)
105 {
106  boost::unique_lock<boost::mutex> ulock(marker_access_lock_);
107  GenericInteraction g;
108  g.construct_marker = construct;
109  g.update_pose = update;
110  g.process_feedback = process;
111  // compute the suffix that will be added to the generated markers
112  g.marker_name_suffix = "_" + name + "_" + boost::lexical_cast<std::string>(active_generic_.size());
113  active_generic_.push_back(g);
114 }
115 
116 static const double DEFAULT_SCALE = 0.25;
117 double RobotInteraction::computeLinkMarkerSize(const std::string& link)
118 {
119  const moveit::core::LinkModel* lm = robot_model_->getLinkModel(link);
120  double size = 0;
121 
122  while (lm)
123  {
124  Eigen::Vector3d ext = lm->getShapeExtentsAtOrigin();
125  // drop largest extension and take norm of two remaining
126  Eigen::MatrixXd::Index max_index;
127  ext.maxCoeff(&max_index);
128  ext[max_index] = 0;
129  size = 1.01 * ext.norm();
130  if (size > 0)
131  break; // break, if a non-empty shape was found
132 
133  // process kinematic chain upwards (but only following fixed joints)
134  // to find a link with some non-empty shape (to ignore virtual links)
135  if (lm->getParentJointModel()->getType() == moveit::core::JointModel::FIXED)
136  lm = lm->getParentLinkModel();
137  else
138  lm = nullptr;
139  }
140  if (!lm)
141  return DEFAULT_SCALE; // no link with non-zero shape extends found
142 
143  // the marker sphere will be half the size, so double the size here
144  return 2. * size;
145 }
146 
147 double RobotInteraction::computeGroupMarkerSize(const std::string& group)
148 {
149  if (group.empty())
150  return DEFAULT_SCALE;
151  const moveit::core::JointModelGroup* jmg = robot_model_->getJointModelGroup(group);
152  if (!jmg)
153  return 0.0;
154 
155  const std::vector<std::string>& links = jmg->getLinkModelNames();
156  if (links.empty())
157  return DEFAULT_SCALE;
158 
159  // compute the aabb of the links that make up the group
160  double size = 0;
161  for (const std::string& link : links)
162  {
163  const moveit::core::LinkModel* lm = robot_model_->getLinkModel(link);
164  if (!lm)
165  continue;
166  Eigen::Vector3d ext = lm->getShapeExtentsAtOrigin();
167 
168  // drop largest extension and take norm of two remaining
169  Eigen::MatrixXd::Index max_index;
170  ext.maxCoeff(&max_index);
171  ext[max_index] = 0;
172  size = std::max(size, 1.01 * ext.norm());
173  }
174 
175  // if size is zero, all links have empty shapes and are placed at same position
176  // in this case, fall back to link marker size
177  if (size == 0)
178  return computeLinkMarkerSize(links[0]);
179 
180  // the marker sphere will be half the size, so double the size here
181  return 2. * size;
182 }
183 
184 void RobotInteraction::decideActiveJoints(const std::string& group)
185 {
186  boost::unique_lock<boost::mutex> ulock(marker_access_lock_);
187  active_vj_.clear();
188 
189  if (group.empty())
190  return;
191 
192  ROS_DEBUG_NAMED("robot_interaction", "Deciding active joints for group '%s'", group.c_str());
193 
194  const srdf::ModelConstSharedPtr& srdf = robot_model_->getSRDF();
195  const moveit::core::JointModelGroup* jmg = robot_model_->getJointModelGroup(group);
196 
197  if (!jmg || !srdf)
198  return;
199 
200  std::set<std::string> used;
201  if (jmg->hasJointModel(robot_model_->getRootJointName()))
202  {
203  moveit::core::RobotState default_state(robot_model_);
204  default_state.setToDefaultValues();
205  std::vector<double> aabb;
206  default_state.computeAABB(aabb);
207 
208  const std::vector<srdf::Model::VirtualJoint>& vj = srdf->getVirtualJoints();
209  for (const srdf::Model::VirtualJoint& joint : vj)
210  if (joint.name_ == robot_model_->getRootJointName())
211  {
212  if (joint.type_ == "planar" || joint.type_ == "floating")
213  {
214  JointInteraction v;
215  v.connecting_link = joint.child_link_;
216  v.parent_frame = joint.parent_frame_;
217  if (!v.parent_frame.empty() && v.parent_frame[0] == '/')
218  v.parent_frame = v.parent_frame.substr(1);
219  v.joint_name = joint.name_;
220  if (joint.type_ == "planar")
221  v.dof = 3;
222  else
223  v.dof = 6;
224  // take the max of the X, Y, Z extent
225  v.size = std::max(std::max(aabb[1] - aabb[0], aabb[3] - aabb[2]), aabb[5] - aabb[4]);
226  active_vj_.push_back(v);
227  used.insert(v.joint_name);
228  }
229  }
230  }
231 
232  const std::vector<const moveit::core::JointModel*>& joints = jmg->getJointModels();
233  for (const moveit::core::JointModel* joint : joints)
234  {
235  if ((joint->getType() == moveit::core::JointModel::PLANAR ||
236  joint->getType() == moveit::core::JointModel::FLOATING) &&
237  used.find(joint->getName()) == used.end())
238  {
239  JointInteraction v;
240  v.connecting_link = joint->getChildLinkModel()->getName();
241  if (joint->getParentLinkModel())
242  v.parent_frame = joint->getParentLinkModel()->getName();
243  v.joint_name = joint->getName();
244  if (joint->getType() == moveit::core::JointModel::PLANAR)
245  v.dof = 3;
246  else
247  v.dof = 6;
248  // take the max of the X, Y, Z extent
249  v.size = computeGroupMarkerSize(group);
250  active_vj_.push_back(v);
251  }
252  }
253 }
254 
255 void RobotInteraction::decideActiveEndEffectors(const std::string& group)
256 {
257  decideActiveEndEffectors(group, InteractionStyle::SIX_DOF);
258 }
259 
260 void RobotInteraction::decideActiveEndEffectors(const std::string& group, InteractionStyle::InteractionStyle style)
261 {
262  boost::unique_lock<boost::mutex> ulock(marker_access_lock_);
263  active_eef_.clear();
264 
265  if (group.empty())
266  return;
267 
268  ROS_DEBUG_NAMED("robot_interaction", "Deciding active end-effectors for group '%s'", group.c_str());
269 
270  const srdf::ModelConstSharedPtr& srdf = robot_model_->getSRDF();
271  const moveit::core::JointModelGroup* jmg = robot_model_->getJointModelGroup(group);
272 
273  if (!jmg || !srdf)
274  {
275  ROS_WARN_NAMED("robot_interaction", "Unable to decide active end effector: no joint model group or no srdf model");
276  return;
277  }
278 
279  const std::vector<srdf::Model::EndEffector>& eefs = srdf->getEndEffectors();
280  const std::pair<moveit::core::JointModelGroup::KinematicsSolver, moveit::core::JointModelGroup::KinematicsSolverMap>&
281  smap = jmg->getGroupKinematics();
282 
283  // if we have an IK solver for the selected group, we check if there are any end effectors attached to this group
284  if (smap.first)
285  {
286  for (const srdf::Model::EndEffector& eef : eefs)
287  if ((jmg->hasLinkModel(eef.parent_link_) || jmg->getName() == eef.parent_group_) &&
288  jmg->canSetStateFromIK(eef.parent_link_))
289  {
290  // We found an end-effector whose parent is the group.
291  EndEffectorInteraction ee;
292  ee.parent_group = group;
293  ee.parent_link = eef.parent_link_;
294  ee.eef_group = eef.component_group_;
295  ee.interaction = style;
296  active_eef_.push_back(ee);
297  }
298 
299  // No end effectors found. Use last link in group as the "end effector".
300  if (active_eef_.empty() && !jmg->getLinkModelNames().empty())
301  {
302  EndEffectorInteraction ee;
303  ee.parent_group = group;
304  ee.parent_link = jmg->getLinkModelNames().back();
305  ee.eef_group = group;
306  ee.interaction = style;
307  active_eef_.push_back(ee);
308  }
309  }
310  else if (!smap.second.empty())
311  {
312  for (const std::pair<const moveit::core::JointModelGroup* const, moveit::core::JointModelGroup::KinematicsSolver>&
313  it : smap.second)
314  {
315  for (const srdf::Model::EndEffector& eef : eefs)
316  {
317  if ((it.first->hasLinkModel(eef.parent_link_) || jmg->getName() == eef.parent_group_) &&
318  it.first->canSetStateFromIK(eef.parent_link_))
319  {
320  // We found an end-effector whose parent is a subgroup of the group. (May be more than one)
321  EndEffectorInteraction ee;
322  ee.parent_group = it.first->getName();
323  ee.parent_link = eef.parent_link_;
324  ee.eef_group = eef.component_group_;
325  ee.interaction = style;
326  active_eef_.push_back(ee);
327  break;
328  }
329  }
330  }
331  }
332 
333  for (EndEffectorInteraction& eef : active_eef_)
334  {
335  // if we have a separate group for the eef, we compute the scale based on it;
336  // otherwise, we use the size of the parent_link
337  eef.size = (eef.eef_group == eef.parent_group) ? computeLinkMarkerSize(eef.parent_link) :
338  computeGroupMarkerSize(eef.eef_group);
339  ROS_DEBUG_NAMED("robot_interaction", "Found active end-effector '%s', of scale %lf", eef.eef_group.c_str(),
340  eef.size);
341  }
342  // if there is only a single end effector marker, we can safely use a larger marker
343  if (active_eef_.size() == 1)
344  active_eef_[0].size *= 1.5;
345 }
346 
347 void RobotInteraction::clear()
348 {
349  boost::unique_lock<boost::mutex> ulock(marker_access_lock_);
350  active_eef_.clear();
351  active_vj_.clear();
352  active_generic_.clear();
353  clearInteractiveMarkersUnsafe();
354  publishInteractiveMarkers();
355 }
356 
357 void RobotInteraction::clearInteractiveMarkers()
358 {
359  boost::unique_lock<boost::mutex> ulock(marker_access_lock_);
360  clearInteractiveMarkersUnsafe();
361 }
362 
363 void RobotInteraction::clearInteractiveMarkersUnsafe()
364 {
365  handlers_.clear();
366  shown_markers_.clear();
367  int_marker_move_subscribers_.clear();
368  int_marker_move_topics_.clear();
369  int_marker_names_.clear();
370  int_marker_server_->clear();
371 }
372 
373 void RobotInteraction::addEndEffectorMarkers(const InteractionHandlerPtr& handler, const EndEffectorInteraction& eef,
374  visualization_msgs::InteractiveMarker& im, bool position, bool orientation)
375 {
376  geometry_msgs::Pose pose;
377  pose.orientation.w = 1;
378  addEndEffectorMarkers(handler, eef, pose, im, position, orientation);
379 }
380 
381 void RobotInteraction::addEndEffectorMarkers(const InteractionHandlerPtr& handler, const EndEffectorInteraction& eef,
382  const geometry_msgs::Pose& im_to_eef,
383  visualization_msgs::InteractiveMarker& im, bool position, bool orientation)
384 {
385  if (eef.parent_group == eef.eef_group || !robot_model_->hasLinkModel(eef.parent_link))
386  return;
387 
388  visualization_msgs::InteractiveMarkerControl m_control;
389  m_control.always_visible = false;
390  if (position && orientation)
391  m_control.interaction_mode = m_control.MOVE_ROTATE_3D;
392  else if (orientation)
393  m_control.interaction_mode = m_control.ROTATE_3D;
394  else
395  m_control.interaction_mode = m_control.MOVE_3D;
396 
397  std_msgs::ColorRGBA marker_color;
398  const float* color = handler->inError(eef) ? END_EFFECTOR_UNREACHABLE_COLOR : END_EFFECTOR_REACHABLE_COLOR;
399  marker_color.r = color[0];
400  marker_color.g = color[1];
401  marker_color.b = color[2];
402  marker_color.a = color[3];
403 
404  moveit::core::RobotStateConstPtr rstate = handler->getState();
405  const std::vector<std::string>& link_names = rstate->getJointModelGroup(eef.eef_group)->getLinkModelNames();
406  visualization_msgs::MarkerArray marker_array;
407  rstate->getRobotMarkers(marker_array, link_names, marker_color, eef.eef_group, ros::Duration());
408  tf2::Transform tf_root_to_link;
409  tf2::fromMsg(tf2::toMsg(rstate->getGlobalLinkTransform(eef.parent_link)), tf_root_to_link);
410  // Release the ptr count on the kinematic state
411  rstate.reset();
412 
413  for (visualization_msgs::Marker& marker : marker_array.markers)
414  {
415  marker.header = im.header;
416  marker.mesh_use_embedded_materials = !marker.mesh_resource.empty();
417  // - - - - - - Do some math for the offset - - - - - -
418  tf2::Transform tf_root_to_im, tf_root_to_mesh, tf_im_to_eef;
419  tf2::fromMsg(im.pose, tf_root_to_im);
420  tf2::fromMsg(marker.pose, tf_root_to_mesh);
421  tf2::fromMsg(im_to_eef, tf_im_to_eef);
422  tf2::Transform tf_eef_to_mesh = tf_root_to_link.inverse() * tf_root_to_mesh;
423  tf2::Transform tf_im_to_mesh = tf_im_to_eef * tf_eef_to_mesh;
424  tf2::Transform tf_root_to_mesh_new = tf_root_to_im * tf_im_to_mesh;
425  tf2::toMsg(tf_root_to_mesh_new, marker.pose);
426  // - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
427  m_control.markers.push_back(marker);
428  }
429 
430  im.controls.push_back(m_control);
431 }
432 
433 static inline std::string getMarkerName(const InteractionHandlerPtr& handler, const EndEffectorInteraction& eef)
434 {
435  return "EE:" + handler->getName() + "_" + eef.parent_link;
436 }
437 
438 static inline std::string getMarkerName(const InteractionHandlerPtr& handler, const JointInteraction& vj)
439 {
440  return "JJ:" + handler->getName() + "_" + vj.connecting_link;
441 }
442 
443 static inline std::string getMarkerName(const InteractionHandlerPtr& handler, const GenericInteraction& g)
444 {
445  return "GG:" + handler->getName() + "_" + g.marker_name_suffix;
446 }
447 
448 void RobotInteraction::addInteractiveMarkers(const InteractionHandlerPtr& handler, const double marker_scale)
449 {
450  // If scale is left at default size of 0, scale will be based on end effector link size. a good value is between 0-1
451  std::vector<visualization_msgs::InteractiveMarker> ims;
452  {
453  boost::unique_lock<boost::mutex> ulock(marker_access_lock_);
454  moveit::core::RobotStateConstPtr s = handler->getState();
455 
456  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < active_generic_.size(); ++i)
457  {
458  visualization_msgs::InteractiveMarker im;
459  if (active_generic_[i].construct_marker(*s, im))
460  {
461  im.name = getMarkerName(handler, active_generic_[i]);
462  shown_markers_[im.name] = i;
463  ims.push_back(im);
464  ROS_DEBUG_NAMED("robot_interaction", "Publishing interactive marker %s (size = %lf)", im.name.c_str(), im.scale);
465  }
466  }
467 
468  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < active_eef_.size(); ++i)
469  {
470  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pose;
471  geometry_msgs::Pose control_to_eef_tf;
472  pose.header.frame_id = robot_model_->getModelFrame();
473  pose.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
474  computeMarkerPose(handler, active_eef_[i], *s, pose.pose, control_to_eef_tf);
475 
476  std::string marker_name = getMarkerName(handler, active_eef_[i]);
477  shown_markers_[marker_name] = i;
478 
479  // Determine interactive maker size
480  double mscale = marker_scale < std::numeric_limits<double>::epsilon() ? active_eef_[i].size : marker_scale;
481 
482  visualization_msgs::InteractiveMarker im = makeEmptyInteractiveMarker(marker_name, pose, mscale);
483  if (handler && handler->getControlsVisible())
484  {
485  if (active_eef_[i].interaction & InteractionStyle::POSITION_ARROWS)
486  addPositionControl(im, active_eef_[i].interaction & InteractionStyle::FIXED);
487  if (active_eef_[i].interaction & InteractionStyle::ORIENTATION_CIRCLES)
488  addOrientationControl(im, active_eef_[i].interaction & InteractionStyle::FIXED);
489  if (active_eef_[i].interaction & (InteractionStyle::POSITION_SPHERE | InteractionStyle::ORIENTATION_SPHERE))
490  {
491  std_msgs::ColorRGBA color;
492  color.r = 0;
493  color.g = 1;
494  color.b = 1;
495  color.a = 0.5;
496  addViewPlaneControl(im, mscale * 0.25, color, active_eef_[i].interaction & InteractionStyle::POSITION_SPHERE,
497  active_eef_[i].interaction & InteractionStyle::ORIENTATION_SPHERE);
498  }
499  }
500  if (handler && handler->getMeshesVisible() &&
501  (active_eef_[i].interaction & (InteractionStyle::POSITION_EEF | InteractionStyle::ORIENTATION_EEF)))
502  addEndEffectorMarkers(handler, active_eef_[i], control_to_eef_tf, im,
503  active_eef_[i].interaction & InteractionStyle::POSITION_EEF,
504  active_eef_[i].interaction & InteractionStyle::ORIENTATION_EEF);
505  ims.push_back(im);
506  registerMoveInteractiveMarkerTopic(marker_name, handler->getName() + "_" + active_eef_[i].parent_link);
507  ROS_DEBUG_NAMED("robot_interaction", "Publishing interactive marker %s (size = %lf)", marker_name.c_str(), mscale);
508  }
509  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < active_vj_.size(); ++i)
510  {
511  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pose;
512  pose.header.frame_id = robot_model_->getModelFrame();
513  pose.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
514  pose.pose = tf2::toMsg(s->getGlobalLinkTransform(active_vj_[i].connecting_link));
515  std::string marker_name = getMarkerName(handler, active_vj_[i]);
516  shown_markers_[marker_name] = i;
517 
518  // Determine interactive maker size
519  double mscale = marker_scale < std::numeric_limits<double>::epsilon() ? active_vj_[i].size : marker_scale;
520 
521  visualization_msgs::InteractiveMarker im = makeEmptyInteractiveMarker(marker_name, pose, mscale);
522  if (handler && handler->getControlsVisible())
523  {
524  if (active_vj_[i].dof == 3) // planar joint
525  addPlanarXYControl(im, false);
526  else
527  add6DOFControl(im, false);
528  }
529  ims.push_back(im);
530  registerMoveInteractiveMarkerTopic(marker_name, handler->getName() + "_" + active_vj_[i].connecting_link);
531  ROS_DEBUG_NAMED("robot_interaction", "Publishing interactive marker %s (size = %lf)", marker_name.c_str(), mscale);
532  }
533  handlers_[handler->getName()] = handler;
534  }
535 
536  // we do this while marker_access_lock_ is unlocked because the interactive marker server locks
537  // for most function calls, and maintains that lock while the feedback callback is running
538  // that can cause a deadlock if we were to run the loop below while marker_access_lock_ is locked
539  for (const visualization_msgs::InteractiveMarker& im : ims)
540  {
541  int_marker_server_->insert(im);
542  int_marker_server_->setCallback(im.name, boost::bind(&RobotInteraction::processInteractiveMarkerFeedback, this, _1));
543 
544  // Add menu handler to all markers that this interaction handler creates.
545  if (std::shared_ptr<interactive_markers::MenuHandler> mh = handler->getMenuHandler())
546  mh->apply(*int_marker_server_, im.name);
547  }
548 }
549 
550 void RobotInteraction::registerMoveInteractiveMarkerTopic(const std::string& marker_name, const std::string& name)
551 {
552  std::stringstream ss;
553  ss << "/rviz/moveit/move_marker/";
554  ss << name;
555  int_marker_move_topics_.push_back(ss.str());
556  int_marker_names_.push_back(marker_name);
557 }
558 
559 void RobotInteraction::toggleMoveInteractiveMarkerTopic(bool enable)
560 {
561  if (enable)
562  {
563  boost::unique_lock<boost::mutex> ulock(marker_access_lock_);
564  if (int_marker_move_subscribers_.empty())
565  {
566  ros::NodeHandle nh;
567  for (size_t i = 0; i < int_marker_move_topics_.size(); i++)
568  {
569  std::string topic_name = int_marker_move_topics_[i];
570  std::string marker_name = int_marker_names_[i];
571  int_marker_move_subscribers_.push_back(nh.subscribe<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>(
572  topic_name, 1, boost::bind(&RobotInteraction::moveInteractiveMarker, this, marker_name, _1)));
573  }
574  }
575  }
576  else
577  {
578  boost::unique_lock<boost::mutex> ulock(marker_access_lock_);
579  int_marker_move_subscribers_.clear();
580  }
581 }
582 
583 void RobotInteraction::computeMarkerPose(const InteractionHandlerPtr& handler, const EndEffectorInteraction& eef,
584  const moveit::core::RobotState& robot_state, geometry_msgs::Pose& pose,
585  geometry_msgs::Pose& control_to_eef_tf) const
586 {
587  // Need to allow for control pose offsets
588  tf2::Transform tf_root_to_link, tf_root_to_control;
589  tf2::fromMsg(tf2::toMsg(robot_state.getGlobalLinkTransform(eef.parent_link)), tf_root_to_link);
590 
591  geometry_msgs::Pose msg_link_to_control;
592  if (handler->getPoseOffset(eef, msg_link_to_control))
593  {
594  tf2::Transform tf_link_to_control;
595  tf2::fromMsg(msg_link_to_control, tf_link_to_control);
596 
597  tf_root_to_control = tf_root_to_link * tf_link_to_control;
598  tf2::toMsg(tf_link_to_control.inverse(), control_to_eef_tf);
599  }
600  else
601  {
602  tf_root_to_control = tf_root_to_link;
603  control_to_eef_tf.orientation.x = 0.0;
604  control_to_eef_tf.orientation.y = 0.0;
605  control_to_eef_tf.orientation.z = 0.0;
606  control_to_eef_tf.orientation.w = 1.0;
607  }
608 
609  tf2::toMsg(tf_root_to_control, pose);
610 }
611 
612 void RobotInteraction::updateInteractiveMarkers(const InteractionHandlerPtr& handler)
613 {
614  std::string root_link;
615  std::map<std::string, geometry_msgs::Pose> pose_updates;
616  {
617  boost::unique_lock<boost::mutex> ulock(marker_access_lock_);
618 
619  moveit::core::RobotStateConstPtr s = handler->getState();
620  root_link = s->getRobotModel()->getModelFrame();
621 
622  for (const EndEffectorInteraction& eef : active_eef_)
623  {
624  std::string marker_name = getMarkerName(handler, eef);
625  geometry_msgs::Pose control_to_eef_tf;
626  computeMarkerPose(handler, eef, *s, pose_updates[marker_name], control_to_eef_tf);
627  }
628 
629  for (JointInteraction& vj : active_vj_)
630  {
631  std::string marker_name = getMarkerName(handler, vj);
632  pose_updates[marker_name] = tf2::toMsg(s->getGlobalLinkTransform(vj.connecting_link));
633  }
634 
635  for (GenericInteraction& gi : active_generic_)
636  {
637  std::string marker_name = getMarkerName(handler, gi);
638  geometry_msgs::Pose pose;
639  if (gi.update_pose && gi.update_pose(*s, pose))
640  pose_updates[marker_name] = pose;
641  }
642  }
643 
644  std_msgs::Header header;
645  header.frame_id = root_link; // marker poses are give w.r.t. root frame
646  for (std::map<std::string, geometry_msgs::Pose>::const_iterator it = pose_updates.begin(); it != pose_updates.end();
647  ++it)
648  int_marker_server_->setPose(it->first, it->second, header);
649  int_marker_server_->applyChanges();
650 }
651 
652 void RobotInteraction::publishInteractiveMarkers()
653 {
654  // the server locks internally, so we need not worry about locking
655  int_marker_server_->applyChanges();
656 }
657 
658 bool RobotInteraction::showingMarkers(const InteractionHandlerPtr& handler)
659 {
660  boost::unique_lock<boost::mutex> ulock(marker_access_lock_);
661 
662  for (const EndEffectorInteraction& eef : active_eef_)
663  if (shown_markers_.find(getMarkerName(handler, eef)) == shown_markers_.end())
664  return false;
665  for (const JointInteraction& vj : active_vj_)
666  if (shown_markers_.find(getMarkerName(handler, vj)) == shown_markers_.end())
667  return false;
668  for (const GenericInteraction& gi : active_generic_)
669  if (shown_markers_.find(getMarkerName(handler, gi)) == shown_markers_.end())
670  return false;
671  return true;
672 }
673 
674 void RobotInteraction::moveInteractiveMarker(const std::string& name, const geometry_msgs::PoseStampedConstPtr& msg)
675 {
676  std::map<std::string, std::size_t>::const_iterator it = shown_markers_.find(name);
677  if (it != shown_markers_.end())
678  {
679  visualization_msgs::InteractiveMarkerFeedback::Ptr feedback(new visualization_msgs::InteractiveMarkerFeedback);
680  feedback->header = msg->header;
681  feedback->marker_name = name;
682  feedback->pose = msg->pose;
683  feedback->event_type = visualization_msgs::InteractiveMarkerFeedback::POSE_UPDATE;
684  processInteractiveMarkerFeedback(feedback);
685  {
686  boost::unique_lock<boost::mutex> ulock(marker_access_lock_);
687  int_marker_server_->setPose(name, msg->pose, msg->header); // move the interactive marker
688  int_marker_server_->applyChanges();
689  }
690  }
691 }
692 
693 void RobotInteraction::processInteractiveMarkerFeedback(
694  const visualization_msgs::InteractiveMarkerFeedbackConstPtr& feedback)
695 {
696  // perform some validity checks
697  boost::unique_lock<boost::mutex> ulock(marker_access_lock_);
698  std::map<std::string, std::size_t>::const_iterator it = shown_markers_.find(feedback->marker_name);
699  if (it == shown_markers_.end())
700  {
701  ROS_ERROR("Unknown marker name: '%s' (not published by RobotInteraction class)", feedback->marker_name.c_str());
702  return;
703  }
704 
705  std::size_t u = feedback->marker_name.find_first_of('_');
706  if (u == std::string::npos || u < 4)
707  {
708  ROS_ERROR("Invalid marker name: '%s'", feedback->marker_name.c_str());
709  return;
710  }
711 
712  feedback_map_[feedback->marker_name] = feedback;
713  new_feedback_condition_.notify_all();
714 }
715 
716 void RobotInteraction::processingThread()
717 {
718  boost::unique_lock<boost::mutex> ulock(marker_access_lock_);
719 
720  while (run_processing_thread_ && ros::ok())
721  {
722  while (feedback_map_.empty() && run_processing_thread_ && ros::ok())
723  new_feedback_condition_.wait(ulock);
724 
725  while (!feedback_map_.empty() && ros::ok())
726  {
727  visualization_msgs::InteractiveMarkerFeedbackConstPtr feedback = feedback_map_.begin()->second;
728  feedback_map_.erase(feedback_map_.begin());
729  ROS_DEBUG_NAMED("robot_interaction", "Processing feedback from map for marker [%s]",
730  feedback->marker_name.c_str());
731 
732  std::map<std::string, std::size_t>::const_iterator it = shown_markers_.find(feedback->marker_name);
733  if (it == shown_markers_.end())
734  {
735  ROS_ERROR("Unknown marker name: '%s' (not published by RobotInteraction class) "
736  "(should never have ended up in the feedback_map!)",
737  feedback->marker_name.c_str());
738  continue;
739  }
740  std::size_t u = feedback->marker_name.find_first_of('_');
741  if (u == std::string::npos || u < 4)
742  {
743  ROS_ERROR("Invalid marker name: '%s' (should never have ended up in the feedback_map!)",
744  feedback->marker_name.c_str());
745  continue;
746  }
747  std::string marker_class = feedback->marker_name.substr(0, 2);
748  std::string handler_name = feedback->marker_name.substr(3, u - 3); // skip the ":"
749  std::map<std::string, InteractionHandlerPtr>::const_iterator jt = handlers_.find(handler_name);
750  if (jt == handlers_.end())
751  {
752  ROS_ERROR("Interactive Marker Handler '%s' is not known.", handler_name.c_str());
753  continue;
754  }
755 
756  // we put this in a try-catch because user specified callbacks may be triggered
757  try
758  {
759  if (marker_class == "EE")
760  {
761  // make a copy of the data, so we do not lose it while we are unlocked
762  EndEffectorInteraction eef = active_eef_[it->second];
763  InteractionHandlerPtr ih = jt->second;
764  marker_access_lock_.unlock();
765  try
766  {
767  ih->handleEndEffector(eef, feedback);
768  }
769  catch (std::exception& ex)
770  {
771  ROS_ERROR("Exception caught while handling end-effector update: %s", ex.what());
772  }
773  marker_access_lock_.lock();
774  }
775  else if (marker_class == "JJ")
776  {
777  // make a copy of the data, so we do not lose it while we are unlocked
778  JointInteraction vj = active_vj_[it->second];
779  InteractionHandlerPtr ih = jt->second;
780  marker_access_lock_.unlock();
781  try
782  {
783  ih->handleJoint(vj, feedback);
784  }
785  catch (std::exception& ex)
786  {
787  ROS_ERROR("Exception caught while handling joint update: %s", ex.what());
788  }
789  marker_access_lock_.lock();
790  }
791  else if (marker_class == "GG")
792  {
793  InteractionHandlerPtr ih = jt->second;
794  GenericInteraction g = active_generic_[it->second];
795  marker_access_lock_.unlock();
796  try
797  {
798  ih->handleGeneric(g, feedback);
799  }
800  catch (std::exception& ex)
801  {
802  ROS_ERROR("Exception caught while handling joint update: %s", ex.what());
803  }
804  marker_access_lock_.lock();
805  }
806  else
807  ROS_ERROR("Unknown marker class ('%s') for marker '%s'", marker_class.c_str(), feedback->marker_name.c_str());
808  }
809  catch (std::exception& ex)
810  {
811  ROS_ERROR("Exception caught while processing event: %s", ex.what());
812  }
813  }
814  }
815 }
816 } // namespace robot_interaction
